Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases (i.e., those ending in 'Payment Handled')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' compared to the frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled' without any rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' is immediately followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurrences that are preceded by 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in variants that do not include any rejection activity (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of total activity executions in the log that correspond to 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases

Name: Number of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' appears more than once in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities

Name: Percentage of variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' among all variants that start with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and end with 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' relative to the frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of cases that include 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and never encounter 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities associated with case amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Ratio of variants containing both 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' to variants containing only 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' without budget owner approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' is part of a re-submission path following any type of rejection (e.g., after 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' or 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' that occur in the year 2018 versus 2017, based on event timestamps (inferred from case progression)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' out of all cases
